reapack.name: CMA - MatrixClearAndSet.lua
reapack.desc: resets region matrix, and sets it from time and track selection

reapack.name: CMA - MatrixSetMaster.lua
reapack.desc: a list of functions used in other scripts for region matrix control

reapack.name: CMA - MatrixSetter.lua
reapack.desc: sets region matrix from time and track selection
